meanings.sent1: The unclothed baby giggled happily in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed when she realized she was unclothed in public.
meanings.sent3: The unclothed man accidentally locked himself out of his house.
meanings.sent4: The unclothed trees stood bare against the winter sky.
meanings.sent5: The unclothed doll lay forgotten in the corner of the room.

meanings.sent1: The unclothed swimmer dove gracefully into the pool.
meanings.sent2: The unclothed model posed confidently for the artist.
meanings.sent3: The unclothed hiker felt the cool breeze on his skin.
meanings.sent4: The unclothed truth was finally revealed to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unclothed statue stood proudly in the town square.
